Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: David St Pierre
Reviews.Content: I bought this item simply because it was white and goes with the theme of the room its in. The picture is good but the audio sounds a bit tinny. After all is said and done I do like the unit, like I said; so far so good.

Reviews.Title: MAJOR PROBLEM
Reviews.Author: RICHARD
Reviews.Content: SHOULD NEVER BE LISTED FOR SALE.. WHEN IT DOES NOT WORK WITH COMCAST'S HD REMOTE.AND THE BUYER IS NOT NOTIFIED...
